sense.def:
To glare at someone
pomeni nekoga jezno gledati.

seg.quote: The two brothers glared at each other.
He shot a suspicious glare at me.

sense.def:
Kadar luč
glares
, zelo močno sveti in zato težko vidimo.

seg.quote: A harsh light glared through the windows.
The windows were tinted to reduce the glare.

sense.def:
To be in the glare of publicity or public attention
pomeni, da ljudje nekoga nenehno opazujejo ali o njem govorijo.

cit.quote: biti izpostavljen javnosti, biti na očeh

seg.quote: At home he can relax once he's away from the glare of publicity.
